sections.title: Mountain Relax
sections.subtitle: The Caucasus grandeur
sections.description: Georgia’s mountains are about silence, space and jaw-dropping views. We build a trip that feels light, not exhausting.
sections.fullDescription: Mountain Georgia has its own rhythm: clear air in the morning and cinematic panoramas throughout the day. We match the format to you: comfort-first, active, or mixed. Expect scenic stops, beautiful roads, tasty breaks and enough time to simply breathe — so the trip feels cohesive and effortless.
sections.imageAlt: Panoramic Caucasus mountains in Georgia — wide ridges and crisp alpine atmosphere

sections.title: Ski Resorts
sections.subtitle: Gudauri & Bakuriani
sections.description: Skiing, views and solid infrastructure. We’ll choose the right resort and a format that fits your style — energetic or calm.
sections.fullDescription: We arrange winter plans end-to-end: transfer, accommodation, rental spots, clear timing and location tips. Gudauri is loved for open slopes and big views; Bakuriani for a calmer, family-friendly vibe. Whether you want full-day skiing or cozy evenings with mountain scenery — we’ll craft your scenario.
sections.imageAlt: Winter ski resort in Georgia — fresh powder, movement and mountain scenery

sections.title: Hiking & Trekking
sections.subtitle: Routes for every level
sections.description: Svaneti, Kazbegi, Tusheti and more — from easy walks to full days of scenery with smart stops and pacing.
sections.fullDescription: We plan trekking the smart way: difficulty, pace, duration, scenic points and comfortable breaks. Choose a one-day hike or a multi-day program with overnights. Optional: picnic, photo stops, more nature or more local authenticity. The priority is a strong experience — without burning out.
sections.imageAlt: Hiker on a narrow mountain trail in Georgia — trekking with panoramic views

sections.title: Mountain Hotels & Guesthouses
sections.subtitle: Comfort with a view
sections.description: Cozy stays where you sleep well and wake up to the scenery: terrace, warm light, quiet nights and mountain air.
sections.fullDescription: We recommend places that truly feel good: clean rooms, atmosphere, service and a view worth waking up early for. We match the stay to your trip: romantic, family, friends, ‘quiet & beautiful’ or ‘base for activities’. Booking and logistics — on us, so it stays simple.
sections.imageAlt: Cozy mountain hotel terrace in Georgia — dramatic peaks and calm evening comfort

sections.title: Ready for an Adventure?
sections.subtitle: Book a mountain tour
sections.description: We’ll tailor a route to your dates: transport, accommodation, activities and a clear plan. Winter or summer — it will be beautiful.
sections.fullDescription: Message us and we’ll propose a few options that match your style: more nature, fewer crowds, more comfort or more activity. We handle routes, timing and service details — so you enjoy the mountains with calm confidence.
sections.imageAlt: Climber near a summit ridge — freedom, altitude and dramatic mountain clouds
